Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that #Temple of Time# is on the way of the hero.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #Epona's Song# can be found at #Kakariko Village#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# teaches #the Serenade of Water#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Deku Seeds (30 pieces)#.

GC (Maze).text: They say that #Water Temple# hoards #Arrows (30 pieces)#.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that the #frozen cavern# echoes with #the Minuet of Forest#.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that the final reward from the #Frogs of Zora's River# is #an Ice Trap#.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that bombing the hole Volvagia last flew into can be rewarding.

HC (Malon).text: They say that #Bombs (20 pieces)# can be found at #Hyrule Field#.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that plundering #Goron City# is a foolish choice.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #Ganon's Castle# hoards #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that #Fire Temple# is on the way of the hero.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that #Sacred Forest Meadow# is on the way of the hero.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that plundering #Gerudo Valley# is a foolish choice.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that #the Iron Boots# can be found at #Death Mountain Trail#.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that #a Gold Skulltula Token# can be found at #the Lost Woods#.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that #a Gold Skulltula Token# can be found at #Gerudo Valley#.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that the #Water Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #Fire Temple# hoards #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that #the Requiem of Spirit# can be found at #Death Mountain Crater#.

LH (Lab).text: They say this game has just a few glitches.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that the #Forest Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that #Deku Tree# hoards #the Weird Egg#.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that a spider behind a #gate in the Water Temple# holds #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that #Spirit Temple# hoards #an Ice Trap#.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that plundering #Dodongo's Cavern# is a foolish choice.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that shadows in an #invisible maze# guard #a Recovery Heart#.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that #Ganon's Castle# hoards #a Strength Upgrade#.

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that #the Giant's Knife# can be found at #Zora's Fountain#.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that #flames in the Composers' Grave# reveal #a Red Rupee#.

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Deku Nuts (5 pieces)#.

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that #Zora's River# is on the way of the hero.

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that #collecting cuccos# rewards #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

ZR (Near Grottos).text: They say that the #Mask of Truth# yields #a Blue Rupee#.

ZR (Open Grotto).text: They say that a single #scrub in the crater# sells #Arrows (5 pieces)#.
